entrance.name: Dungeon Entrance
entrance.description: You are standing at the entrance of a dark dungeon. The air is cold and damp.

hallway.name: Long Hallway
hallway.description: A long, narrow hallway stretching into the darkness. There are doors to the east and west.

armory.name: Old Armory
armory.description: Racks of rusted weapons line the walls. It smells of old iron.

library.name: Dusty Library
library.description: Shelves filled with rotting books. A strange glow comes from the corner.

items.torch: A wooden torch with an unlit rag.
items.sword: A rusty but usable iron sword.
items.shield: A wooden shield with a crack in it.
